title: Happy Valentines Day ❤️ 💐 💑
content: Love is in air Love is everywhere 🌎 Love is eternal 👍 Love makes you happy 😊 Love is a feeling Love ❤️ is Love ❤️ 😉 Express your love ❤️ to your loved ones Say "Sorry" and be together 💑 Say "Miss You" to remember each other Say "Love You" to your Loved ones  & Enjoy your lovely life Love is forever and precious too.. Gain love and stay happy I wish you all " Happy Valentines Day ❤️ "
